body_html: one of our next big features we are going to add is to introduce a scalar type into PyTorch, autograd compatible. With this, the sync-points issue will be solved. Until then, we dont plan to solve it with any intermediate fixes.

body: one of our next big features we are going to add is to introduce a scalar type into PyTorch, autograd compatible. With this, the sync-points issue will be solved. Until then, we dont plan to solve it with any intermediate fixes.
